attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i want the way access to my children and other fathers in my positon to be sorted out in a more evenly handed way and not always in the mothers favour for what seems no logical reason i want equal access to mean equal access not when it suits the mother

rejection.details: Please change the main sentence to a clear action for HM Government.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
